summary: ConsoleDocs - Decent provides fast, cheap, and reliable cross-chain swaps and transactions. Build API requests, set fee splits, and view transaction analytics, all without code. Decent's APIs & hooks enable developers to build one-click cross-chain swaps into their applications to support any token on any chain's first day. Checkout is an embeddable solution that bundles cross-chain swaps, onramping, and offramping. Decent provides market leading chain and token coverage, able to support any chain on its first day. Decent provides a web of connectivity at key junctures of users' cross-chain journeys. Decent delivers the most comprehensive package for developers and applications to manage transactions.
